description.content: Determines which suggestions a person is eligible for and which they are not, including reasons and next steps.
(Required) The NHS number of the person.
The category for which the caller is checking eligibility suggestions. If not provided, eligibility for all supported categories will be checked.
The diseases or conditions for which the caller is checking eligibility suggestions in a comma separated list. If not provided, eligibility for all supported diseases will be checked.
When Y is passed in, the API will include one or more actions as applicable.  Passing in N will result in no actions being calculated or returned.

description.content: (Required) The NHS number of the person.

When Y is passed in, the API will include one or more actions as applicable.  Passing in N will result in no actions being calculated or returned.
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
